TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LocalizationExtenderProvider extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider, class System.IDisposable
Public Class LocalizationExtenderProvider Implements IDisposable, IExtenderProvider
public ref class LocalizationExtenderProvider : IDisposable, System::ComponentModel::IExtenderProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Use CodeDomLocalizationProvider instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 向根设计器提供本地化功能的设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support for localization features to a root designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以扩展使用一组的属性和方法对于.NET Framework 本地化体系结构提供支持。 can extend an with a set of properties and methods that provide support for the .NET Framework localization architecture. 有关使用资源的详细信息，请参阅[本地化](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/localization.md)。For more about using resources, see [Localization](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/localization.md). 本地化支持体系结构使设计器来初始化使用资源文件可以在运行时以支持多种语言、 特定于区域性的样式和动态可配置功能的交换的组件属性。The localization support architecture enables designers to initialize component properties using resource files that can be swapped at run time to support a variety of languages, culture-specific styles and dynamically configurable features. 此类的方法可用于使设计器和代码生成序列化程序以从资源加载和生成使用本地化功能的初始化代码。You can use the methods of this class to enable designers and code generating serializers to load from resources and build initialization code that uses localization features. 默认序列化程序附带有 Visual Studio 已能够本地化组件和控件，但它们仅在这样做如果它们查找支持的.NET Framework 本地化体系结构。The default serializers that ship with Visual Studio are already capable of localizing components and controls, but they only do so if they locate support for the .NET Framework localization architecture. 若要检测的本地化支持的状态，序列化系统必须找到公共上根设计器组件名为"Localizable"的属性。To detect the presence of localization support, the serialization system must locate a public property named "Localizable" on the root designer component. 如果序列化程序找到此属性，它搜索类型的属性名为"语言"来确定当前的资源配置。If a serializer finds this property, it searches for a property of type named "Language" to determine the current resource configuration. 默认序列化程序使用这些属性以确定是否应该进行本地化的组件，任何可本地化的资源，以及如果是这样，什么应中保存的资源信息的格式。Default serializers use these properties to determine if it should localize any localizable resources of the component, and if so, what format the resource information should be saved in. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到组件。The following code example adds a to a component. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例包括示例组件和设计器。The following code example includes an example component and designer. 该设计器使用添加组件的本地化支持属性。The designer uses a to add localization support properties for the component. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的服务提供程序和基组件初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified service provider and base component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，新将当前语言设置为，即泛型对象，且默认语言资源设置。By default, a new sets the current language to , which is the generic and default language resource setting. 此设置会使设计器生成引用泛型语言资源的代码。This setting causes a designer to generate code that references the generic language resource. 您可以创建其他对象来表示和标识其他本地化程序可以在运行时使用的资源数据。You can create other objects to represent and identify other localized resource data that a program can use at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新对象。The following code example creates a new object. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 处置由 占用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的对象初始化与本地化的资源设计器加载时，此方法会将指定的对象的资源区域性设置为用于指定对象的值的加载时初始化设计器的资源区域性。If the specified object was initialized with localized resources when the designer loaded, this method sets the resource culture for the specified object to the resource culture used to initialize the values of the specified object when the designer loaded. 如果指定的对象不具有任何以前的资源的区域性设置，将当前资源区域性设置为。If the specified object had no previous resource culture setting, the current resource culture is set to .
